resources.string: Please make sure you enter an email address and password!
Account successfully created! You can now Login.
Please make sure you enter an email address and password!
Not a member? Get registered in FitnessHeal now!
Password too short, enter minimum 6 characters!
Authentication failed, check your email and password or sign up
We just need your registered Email Id to sent you password reset instructions.
This interface offers the instant exchange of messages which will from one user of the application to another user registered in the database with unique id.
This interface offers all the users of the application, within the range of given hotspot to exchange the documents instantly.
This interface offers the security features of instantly transfer the users preferred friend to get information like his current location along with the alert message.
This interface offers the user to exchange any photo clicked from users camera along with uploading and downloading it safely from the server.
This interface offers the user to retrieve, watch and share videos as per the playlist or according to his wish either on the application interface or on the YouTube interface.
This interface offers the user to know about different application modules of the application and our contact email address.
